name: New Product Request
description: Submit a request to introduce a new product to ShopCorp's inventory, including details on product features, pricing, and supplier information.

name: Price Change Request
description: Request a price change for an existing product in ShopCorp's inventory, including justification for the change and expected impact on sales.

name: Inventory Replenishment Request
description: Submit a request to replenish inventory for a specific product at a particular store location, including quantity and expected delivery date.

name: Employee Access Request
description: Request access to specific ShopCorp systems or applications for a new or existing employee, including justification for access and supervisor approval.

name: Customer Complaint Resolution
description: Report and resolve customer complaints regarding products, services, or store experiences, including details on the issue and proposed resolution.

name: Store Maintenance Request
description: Submit a request for maintenance or repair work at a ShopCorp store location, including details on the issue and expected resolution timeline.

name: Vendor Application
description: Apply to become a vendor for ShopCorp, including company information, product offerings, and compliance with ShopCorp's policies and procedures.

name: Employee Transfer Request
description: Request a transfer to a different store location or role within ShopCorp, including justification for the transfer and supervisor approval.

name: Product Return Request
description: Submit a request to return a product to a vendor or supplier, including details on the reason for return and expected credit or refund.

name: Digital Coupon Creation
description: Request the creation of a digital coupon for a specific product or promotion, including details on the coupon terms, expiration date, and target audience.
